full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender RFP #**: W6893-22A010
**Description of Tender**: Acquisition of Furniture Categories (CAT) 1, 2, 5, and 6 for the Department of National Defence (DND) in Saint-Jean

**Notice Information:**

| **Field** | **Value** |
| :-------------------- | :----------------- |
| Tender Notice Reference Number | WS3606409128-Doc3607423289 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3606409128 |
| Amendment Number | 3 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2022-09-16T14:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | N/A |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2023-04-10 |
| Tender Status | Expired |

**Scope of Work and Delivery:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), on behalf of National Defence, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of Furniture Categories (CAT) 1, 2, 5, and 6, including delivery and installation, to be located in Saint-Jean, Quebec, Canada.

The proposed scope of work includes the furnishing, delivering, and installing the following items:

* Partition walls
* Monitor arms or stands
* Office furniture
* Desks

**Selection Criteria:**

* Price: Lowest price will be the sole consideration for awarding the contract.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to relevant trade agreements:

Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Contracting Entity:**

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC
K1A 0S5
Canada

**Contact Information:**

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:

Jul
